history.proof: intros m n H. srun best use: relp_mult3, rel_prime_sym.

exceptions.exn: In environment m, n : Z H : rel_prime (m * m) (n * n) Unable to unify "Zis_gcd (?M1840 * ?M1840) (?M1841 * ?M1841) 1" with "Zis_gcd (m + n) (m - n) 1".

In environment H0 : forall m n : Z, rel_prime m n -> rel_prime (m * m) (n * n) m, n : Z H3 : forall x : Z, (x | m * m) -> (x | n * n) -> (x | 1) x : Z H : n * n = x * 1 x0 : Z H2 : m * m = x0 * 1 Unable to unify "n * n = x * 1" with "rel_prime (m + n) (m - n)".

original: intros m n H. apply relp_sum. apply prop2. apply H.
